title: Iranian Basketball Super League
text: The Iranian Basketball Super League (IBSL) is a <a href="professional">professional</a> men's <a href="basketball">basketball</a> <a href="list%20of%20basketball%20leagues">league</a> in <a href="Iran">Iran</a>. It was founded in 1998. The current 2018–19 champions is <a href="Shahrdari%20Gorgan%20BC">Shahrdari Gorgan</a>. The league follows the <a href="promotion%20and%20relegation">promotion and relegation</a> system in which the worst two teams are relegated to 1st Division.
